001package com.github.siroshun09.configapi.bukkit;
002
003import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common.FileUtils;
004import com.github.siroshun09.configapi.common.Yaml;
005import org.bukkit.configuration.file.YamlConfiguration;
006import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
007import org.jetbrains.annotations.Nullable;
008
009import java.io.IOException;
010import java.nio.file.Path;
011import java.util.ArrayList;
012import java.util.Collections;
013import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
014import java.util.List;
015import java.util.Objects;
016import java.util.Set;
017
018/**
019 * This class implements {@link Yaml} on Bukkit.
020 * <p>
021 * Using null for @NotNull argument will cause a {@link NullPointerException}.
022 */
023public class BukkitYaml implements Yaml {
024
025    protected final Path filePath;
026    protected YamlConfiguration config;
027
028    /**
029     * Creates an {@link BukkitYaml} with no default values.
030     * <p>
031     * This constructor loads the file automatically.
032     *
033     * @param filePath File path to load or save.
034     */
035    public BukkitYaml(@NotNull Path filePath) {
036        this(filePath, true);
037        config = null;
038    }
039
040    /**
041     * Creates an {@link BukkitYaml} with no default values.
042     *
043     * @param filePath File path to load or save.
044     * @param autoLoad True if automatically load, false otherwise.
045     */
046    public BukkitYaml(@NotNull Path filePath, boolean autoLoad) {
047        Objects.requireNonNull(filePath, "filePath must not be null.");
048
049        this.filePath = filePath;
050        if (autoLoad) load();
051    }
052
053    /**
054     * Loads a yaml file.
055     * <p>
056     * If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one.
057     *
058     * @return True if the load is successful or false if it is failure.
059     */
060    @Override
061    public boolean load() {
062        if (FileUtils.checkFile(filePath)) {
063            config = YamlConfiguration.loadConfiguration(filePath.toFile());
064            return true;
065        } else {
066            return false;
067        }
068    }
069
070    /**
071     * Checks if the file is loaded.
072     *
073     * @return True if the file is loaded or false if it is not loaded.
074     */
075    @Override
076    public boolean isLoaded() {
077        return config != null;
078    }
079
080    /**
081     * Save to yaml file.
082     * <p>
083     * If a yaml file is not found, this method will create one.
084     *
085     * @return True if the save is successful or false if it is failure.
086     */
087    @Override
088    public boolean save() {
089        try {
090            if (FileUtils.checkFile(filePath)) {
091                getConfig().save(filePath.toFile());
092                return true;
093            }
094        } catch (IOException e) {
095            e.printStackTrace();
096        }
097        return false;
098    }
099
100    /**
101     * Get the path to a yaml file.
102     *
103     * @return The path to a yaml file.
104     */
105    @Override
106    @NotNull
107    public Path getPath() {
108        return filePath;
109    }
110
111    /**
112     * Gets {@link YamlConfiguration}.
113     *
114     * @return {@link YamlConfiguration}
115     * @throws IllegalStateException Throws when a yaml file is not loaded.
116     */
117    @NotNull
118    public YamlConfiguration getConfig() throws IllegalStateException {
119        if (isLoaded()) {
120            return config;
121        } else {
122            throw new IllegalStateException("A yaml file is not loaded.");
123        }
124    }
125
126    /**
127     * Gets the requested boolean by path.
128     * <p>
129     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns {@code false}.
130     *
131     * @param path Path of the boolean to get.
132     * @return Requested boolean.
133     */
134    @Override
135    public boolean getBoolean(@NotNull String path) {
136        return getBoolean(path, false);
137    }
138
139    /**
140     * Gets the requested boolean by path.
141     *
142     * @param path Path of the boolean to get.
143     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
144     * @return Requested boolean.
145     */
146    @Override
147    public boolean getBoolean(@NotNull String path, boolean def) {
148        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
149        return isLoaded() ? config.getBoolean(path, def) : def;
150    }
151
152    /**
153     * Gets the requested double by path.
154     * <p>
155     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
156     *
157     * @param path Path of the double to get.
158     * @return Requested double.
159     */
160    @Override
161    public double getDouble(@NotNull String path) {
162        return getDouble(path, 0);
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Gets the requested double by path.
167     *
168     * @param path Path of the double to get.
169     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
170     * @return Requested double.
171     */
172    @Override
173    public double getDouble(@NotNull String path, double def) {
174        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
175        return isLoaded() ? config.getDouble(path, def) : def;
176    }
177
178    /**
179     * Gets the requested integer by path.
180     * <p>
181     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
182     *
183     * @param path Path of the integer to get.
184     * @return Requested integer.
185     */
186    @Override
187    public int getInt(@NotNull String path) {
188        return getInt(path, 0);
189    }
190
191    /**
192     * Gets the requested integer by path.
193     *
194     * @param path Path of the integer to get.
195     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
196     * @return Requested integer.
197     */
198    @Override
199    public int getInt(@NotNull String path, int def) {
200        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
201        return isLoaded() ? config.getInt(path, def) : def;
202    }
203
204    /**
205     * Gets the requested long by path.
206     * <p>
207     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns 0.
208     *
209     * @param path Path of the long to get.
210     * @return Requested long.
211     */
212    @Override
213    public long getLong(@NotNull String path) {
214        return getLong(path, 0);
215    }
216
217    /**
218     * Gets the requested long by path.
219     *
220     * @param path Path of the long to get.
221     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
222     * @return Requested long.
223     */
224    @Override
225    public long getLong(@NotNull String path, long def) {
226        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
227        return isLoaded() ? config.getLong(path, def) : def;
228    }
229
230    /**
231     * Gets the requested string by path.
232     * <p>
233     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty string.
234     *
235     * @param path Path of the string to get.
236     * @return Requested string.
237     */
238    @Override
239    @NotNull
240    public String getString(@NotNull String path) {
241        return getString(path, "");
242    }
243
244    /**
245     * Gets the requested string by path.
246     *
247     * @param path Path of the string to get.
248     * @param def  The default value to return if the value could not be obtained.
249     * @return Requested string.
250     */
251    @Override
252    @NotNull
253    public String getString(@NotNull String path, @NotNull String def) {
254        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
255        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
256
257        String value = isLoaded() ? config.getString(path, def) : null;
258        return value != null ? value : def;
259    }
260
261    /**
262     * Gets the requested string list by path.
263     * <p>
264     * If the value could not be obtained, this method returns an empty string list.
265     *
266     * @param path Path of the string list to get.
267     * @return Requested string list.
268     */
269    @Override
270    @NotNull
271    public List<String> getStringList(@NotNull String path) {
272        return getStringList(path, new ArrayList<>());
273    }
274
275    /**
276     * Gets the requested string list by path.
277     *
278     * @param path Path of the string list to get.
279     * @param def  The default list to return if the value could not be obtained.
280     * @return Requested string list.
281     */
282    @Override
283    @NotNull
284    public List<String> getStringList(@NotNull String path, @NotNull List<String> def) {
285        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
286        Objects.requireNonNull(def, "def must not be null.");
287
288        List<String> list = isLoaded() ? config.getStringList(path) : Collections.emptyList();
289        return !list.isEmpty() ? list : def;
290    }
291
292    /**
293     * Gets a set containing keys in this yaml file.
294     * <p>
295     * The returned set does not include deep key.
296     *
297     * @return Set of keys contained within this yaml file.
298     */
299    @Override
300    @NotNull
301    public Set<String> getKeys() {
302        return isLoaded() ? config.getKeys(false) : new LinkedHashSet<>();
303    }
304
305    /**
306     * Set the value to the specified path.
307     * <p>
308     * If given value is null, the path will be removed.
309     *
310     * @param path  Path of the object to set.
311     * @param value New value to set the path to.
312     */
313    @Override
314    public void set(@NotNull String path, @Nullable Object value) {
315        Objects.requireNonNull(path, "path must not be null.");
316
317        if (isLoaded()) {
318            config.set(path, value);
319        }
320    }
321}
